A2.T2.caption: Table 2: Hyper-parameter sweep on Convex Quadratics. All algorithms are tuned for learning rate and initialisation of w𝑤w. Baselines are tuned for decay rate; meta-learned variant are tuned for the meta-learning rate.
A2.T2.table:
Learning rate [.1, .3, .7, .9, 3., 5.]
w𝑤w init scale [0., 0.3, 1., 3., 10., 30.]
Decay rate / Meta-learning rate [0.001, 0.003, 0.01, .03, .1, .3, 1., 3., 10., 30.]
references: Given that the solution is always (0,0)00(0,0), this experiment revolves around understanding how different algorithms deal with curvature. Given symmetry in the solution and ill-conditioning, we fix the initialisation to x0=(4,4)subscript𝑥044x_{0}=(4,4) for all sampled Q𝑄Qs and all algorithms and train for 100100100 iterations. For each Q𝑄Q and each algorithm, we sweep over the learning rate, decay rate, and the initialization of w𝑤w see Table 2. For each method, we then report the results for the combination of hyper parameters that performed the best.
